#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
typedef long long loong;
loong power(loong n)
{if(n==1)
return 5;
if(n%2==0)
return power(n/2)*power(n/2);
n--;
return 5*power(n/2)*power(n/2);
}
int main() {
loong a[8003];
	a[0]=0;a[1]=5;
	loong i=2,j,tmp,c=2;
	while(i<=8000)
	{tmp=i;
	a[i]=power(c);
	i++;
	for(j=1;j<tmp && i<=8000;j++)
	{a[i]=a[tmp]+a[j];
	i++;
	}
	c++;
	}
	
int t,n;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{cin>>n;		
	cout<<a[n]<<endl;	
}
		return 0;
}
